VIDEO: üáµüá±ü¶á The Polish 'Bat-mum' who has saved 1,600 bats

Pensioner Barbara Gorecka, 69, takes care of ailing bats in her ninth-floor flat in northwest Poland. The bats are sick or injured, or have abruptly woken up from hibernation.
